ygData.messageBody:
That's a good idea. Seeing as that is one the wizards specialties, we
should feedback verant to expand us in that direction. Rather than
trying to make our class what it isn't (with pets and SoW and such). I
see 4 spell ideas in your post:

bind affinity 2: Bind yourself ONLY to a second bind point
gate 2: Gate to yours second bind point
portal home: Group teleport back to our bind location
gate other: teleport group member back to their bind location

If we work together and figure out a *fair* level to get these spells at
we could give feedback to verant about it. After all, we as seekers of
knowledge should be thinking of ways ( in game ) to increase our power.
These could be researched spells for instance where we have to discover
the runes that make it! Or a Norrath-wide contest to see who can figure
out the correct combination first.

Oh btw, what are you fighting and where at 19th level? That's how far I
am and just got there! Thanks!
